name: Essay Generation and Knowledge Expansion
description: Tests ability to query structured content for essays and reports from knowledge base

theory.natural_language: Artificial Intelligence facts: Machine learning is a type of AI. Deep learning is a type of machine learning. Neural networks power deep learning. AI can recognize images. AI can understand speech. AI can translate languages. AI assists in medical diagnosis. AI helps in drug discovery. AI enables autonomous vehicles. Ethical concerns: AI raises privacy concerns. AI may cause job displacement. AI bias affects decisions. AI needs regulation. AI should be transparent. Benefits: AI increases productivity. AI reduces human error. AI enables personalization. AI accelerates research. Historical context: Alan Turing proposed the Turing test. The term AI was coined in 1956. Expert systems emerged in the 1980s. Deep learning breakthrough in 2012. ChatGPT launched in 2022.

expected_answer.natural_language: AI can recognize images, understand speech, and translate languages.

queries.natural_language: When was the term AI coined?

expected_answer.natural_language: The term AI was coined in 1956.

queries.natural_language: Is deep learning a type of machine learning?

expected_answer.natural_language: Yes, deep learning is a type of machine learning.

queries.natural_language: Does AI assist in medical diagnosis?

expected_answer.natural_language: Yes, AI assists in medical diagnosis.
